summary: Frontend testing of 4 major UI/UX improvements: Language Switcher, Connection Status Indicators, OMEGA Subtitle, and Navigation. All 10 features tested successfully.

issues: HTML nesting warning: <button> cannot be a descendant of <button> in AllyCommunicationsHub component (lines 145, 172) - minor React hydration warning

critical_code_review_comments: All i18n translations working correctly for EN/ES
Connection status defaults to NOT_CONNECTED showing MOCK DATA badges correctly
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
test_credentials: None required - all data is mocked
seed_data_creation: N/A - using mocked data from LanguageContext and ConnectionContext
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI/UX improvements fully tested. Key test IDs: language-selector, language-dropdown, language-option-en, language-option-es, language-option-more, connection-status-chip, data-source-badge-official-teams, logs-btn, community-btn, help-center-btn, admin-console-btn, theme-toggle-btn. Language stored in localStorage key 'omega-language'.
